about.heading: About Me
about.description: As an aspiring web developer, I'm on a mission to learn, grow, and make my mark in the ever-evolving world of technology. While I may be at the beginning of my journey, I'm committed to soaking up knowledge and mastering everything from HTML and CSS to JavaScript and beyond. I'm excited to embark on this journey of growth and discovery, and I'm ready to make my mark in the world of web development.

timeline.title: High School
timeline.description: Matriculated from Spine Road High School.

timeline.title: Life Choices Academy
timeline.description: Started at Life Choices, just after finishing High School.

items.name: Anushqa Kandan
items.testimonial: Masoodah is an extremely dedicated worker who always strives to do the best she can. She remains willing to attain new knowledge and works very well in a team. Masoodah has the ability to create a comfortable atmosphere for those around her.

items.name: Asheeka Samuels
items.testimonial: One of Masoodah's strong suits is communication and teamwork. I've had the pleasure of working with Masoodah and what I can say from our interactions is that she is a dedicated and hardworking individual.

items.name: Candice Keet
items.testimonial: In the short amount of time that I got to know Masoodah, I've experienced her kindness, dedication to her coding and how hard she works to perfect what she does. Whenever I would need help and I asked her for help, she would never turn me down and always try to help me to the best of her abilities. I'm always motivated by her dedication towards coding. Not only can she work well in a team but she's a kind, hardworking, and problem-solver and if that's what you're looking for, I most definitely recommend Masoodah.

items.name: Caitlin Dalwai
items.testimonial: Having worked closely with Masoodah at Life Choices Academy, I wholeheartedly recommend her for any role within your esteemed tech company. Masoodah possesses an exceptional blend of technical expertise, innovative thinking, and a strong work ethic that consistently delivers outstanding results. Her ability to grasp complex technical concepts swiftly and apply them effectively in practical scenarios is truly impressive.

items.name: Nazneen Abrahams
items.testimonial: Masoodah is a hardworking individual, who exceeds all expectations. Working with Masoodah is an absolute pleasure, she brings a positive atmosphere and motivates those around her.
